name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Prying Eyes for Twitch - Hide Your Details

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hide your email and phone number in your Twitch settings

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Update, 18th Oct 2021: This feature has been integrated natively into Twitch, read more here: https://twitch.uservoice.com/forums/310228-account-management-e-g-login-connections-pass/suggestions/44207337-click-to-reveal-phone-number

This extension will be kept up for legacy purposes.

---

This extension hides the phone number and email address on your Twitch Profile security settings page. It might be useful if you're sharing your screen.

More features and reliability fixes coming soon! All feedback appreciated.
